short_summary: Virtual second language training for employees
description: Provide virtual second language training to employees of the Centralized Network Branch.
tags: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
full_summary:
Tender Announcement: Virtual Second Language Training
=====================================================

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: PW-22-01019024
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Solicitation Number**: CIC 153931
* **Publication Date**: December 26, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 26, 2023, at 2:00 PM
* **Amendment Date**: January 23, 2023
* **GSIN**: U099D (Language Training Services)
* **UNSpsc**: None
* **Procurement Category**: SRV (Services)
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding

### Contract Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Citizenship and Immigration Canada (CIC)
* **Contract Value**: Not specified
* **Contract Duration**: Three (3) years, including all options
* **Regions of Opportunity**: National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Regions of Deliveries**: National Capital Region (NCR)

### Trade Agreements

This tender is open to eligible contractors subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement (CHFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

### Contact Information

For any inquiries, please contact:

* Daniela Arghius
* IRCC.BidsReceiving-Receptiondessoumissions.IRCC@cic.gc.ca

### Attachments

The tender documents, including the Request for Proposal and the Amendment, can be found at the following links:

* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/26/32c808e391ea92ece6757cf20ca38299/cic-153931-_rfp_en.pdf
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca
